it.polimi.ingsw.lim.parser

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.parser.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by FabCars. The task of this class is to parse all game info (e.g. cards, excommunications, bonuses) from some files. The directory that contain all the file, is given by the caller.

      • parseTimerStartGame

        public static int parseTimerStartGame(java.lang.String pathToDirectory)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      InvalidTimerException
        the task of this method is to parse a timer (from a Json File). this timer will be used when a new player create a new room (is the waiting time for the new player that wants to join this room). it must be at least 60 second
        Parameters:
        pathToDirectory - is the path to the config timers file (from the root or from the working directory)
        Returns:
        an int (value of the timer in second)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if in the given path do not exist the file needed
        InvalidTimerException - if the time is not specified or invalid

      • parseTimerPlayMove

        public static int parseTimerPlayMove(java.lang.String pathToDirectory)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     InvalidTimerException
        the task of this method is to parse a timer (from a Json File). this timer will be used during the turn of a player (is the maximum time to play a move). it must be at least 60 second.
        Parameters:
        pathToDirectory - is the path to the config timers file (from the root or from the working directory)
        Returns:
        an int (value of the timer in second)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if in the given path do not exist the file needed
        InvalidTimerException - if the time is not specified or invalid

      • parser

        public Parser parser(java.lang.String pathToDirectory)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     InvalidCardException,
                     InvalidExcommunicationException,
                     InvalidTimerException
        Parameters:
        pathToDirectory -
        Returns:
        a parsed game (object Parser)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if in the given path do not exist the file needed
        InvalidCardException - if even just one of the not nullable variables is null or invalid
        InvalidExcommunicationException - if even just one of the not nullable variables is null or invalid
        InvalidTimerException - if even just one of the timer is not valid (or null)
